text: Pen nɨbi God nop mapen lɨlɨg penpen mapen lɨlɨg, tap jɨmñɨl ñɨŋɨnɨg apnan gɨpɨm ñɨn ak, kɨli God nop gos ma nɨŋɨd, yokɨp apɨl monmon gɨpal. Gos kɨli ke nepal. Anɨb ak kɨli wɨsɨp ak yɨgen dɨl dad okok nɨb okok nɨb gɨl, apɨl sub wɨdɨn yu gup tek mɨdebal. Pen kɨli mab ñɨŋeb mɨdup ma pulup tek ak mɨdebal. Mab mɨlep gek, jɨj abe tɨg ju dɨyokɨpal tek mɨdebal. Anɨgel, kawnan nab kɨli ayaŋ pɨsnep kumub.
